ygData.subject: Hell Level
ygData.msgSnippet: Hiya all, I made level 40 yesterday and was wondering if anyone knew what would be a good place to go, being a bard I don t have the luxury of being able to
ygData.messageBody:
Hiya all,

I made level 40 yesterday and was wondering if anyone knew what would be a
good place to go, being a bard I don't have the luxury of being able to
solo dwarfs all day and make it out of hell.

I am really trying hard to level as fast as I can now because I have some
of the best equipment available to me but lack the level to go to the
planes with my guild.

Any info on where to fight would be greatly appreciated.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 40 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server

Ps Traded for a white wolf hide cloak last night, wooo
